name: Ponzimulator
description:
Have you ever wanted to run your own Ponzi scheme? Now's your chance! Introducing Ponzimulator: a totally accurate, completely stable Ponzi scheme simulator that will see you flying to the moon! Grow your stock to attract marks until you become too big to fail. 

Credits:

Alexis Martineau - Programmer/ Game Designer

Thomas Porta - Programmer / Game Designer

Louis Torres Tailfer - Musical Composition / Sound Design

Sophie Artemigi - Additional sound effect
